Title: Petronet seeks one August LNG cargo for delivery to Dahej
Description: Indiaâ€™s state-owned Petronet has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on Aug. 13, 14, 21 or 30 to its 17.5 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Dahej receiving terminal In Gujarat. The tender closes on Aug. 3, with offers expected to remain valid until a day later.
